text: Saint François d'Assise is an opera in three acts and eight scenes. The music and libretto were written by Olivier Messiaen. The opera was written from 1975 to 1983. The first performance was given by the Paris Opéra at the Palais Garnier on November 28, 1983. Category:20th-century operas Category:1983 works
title: Saint Francis of Assisi (opera)
